attributes.action: Reduction of HMRC taxes for Nurses
attributes.additional_details: We are struggling, in as much as we love the job (patient care/safety we do), however we barely left with anything or nothing after total deductions removed from the little income we earn. We struggle to make ends meet. Some of us are in debt, borrowing money to put food on the table, pay bills, etc. Alot of nurses are leaving the country for more better greener pastures. Please we need government to reduce our tax. If government can't pay us well, Please help us to save the little we earn.
attributes.background: Please We want the government to review/ reduce HMRC tax for Nurses.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do as we're not sure which taxes you would like to reduce for nurses.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
